reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and lightweight, with one noting it doesn't cause allergies like other materials.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute and comfy
items.body: really cute, nice details and soft. Fits perfectly which for me is a little loose, as pictured. It was perfect for fall. As mentioned in the title it is lightweight. Read more
items.author: Jennifer S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Already Bought 2 Colors & Would Buy More
items.body: Love this sweater! I actually ordered the Parchment color first, thinking it would be a soft off-white color. It was waaay too yellow. So I returned it and then bought the White color, which was the soft off-white I was hoping for. It’s not a bright white. I also bought the Black. The sweater is lightweight, so not super warm. But it does the trick for wearing in the office or for a nice dinner out. The detail along the neckline is simple and beautiful - it adds just a touch of interest to what is a pretty basic sweater. The fit is great. I am normally a medium and the medium fit well - not too tight and not too baggy. It’s a professional look. I’m 6’0 - so long arms - and the sleeves are about the same as most other sweaters - I tend to just push the up my forearms a bit at the office. No issues with the torso length. Read more
items.author: CSally

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft
items.body: This is a very comfortable sweater, soft and nice Read more
items.author: Chica1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dokotoo Women's Casual Sweater
items.body: I love this Dokotoo sweater!! I ordered a medium and it fits perfect! It's lightweight, so soft and comfortable. The design on the top is cute and makes it stylish looking. You can easily dress it up or down if you want, while staying warm. The neckline and cuffs are nice and firm to keep it looking stylish too. Read more
items.author: Carol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: So soft & thin. Fitted but not tight. Just enough to be pretty and flattering. Exactly what I wanted! Read more
items.author: melissa peters

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little short
items.body: Pretty sweaters and color but if you’re tall it sit just right at your waist so seemed a little short Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend
items.body: I’m 5’7” 138# 34B, and the size medium was perfect. The sleeves are a good length. The sweater is a nice quality and style. It is a lighter weight sweater, not bulky. I really like this and would consider buying another in a different color. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Light Blue
items.body: It is very soft and washes well in cold water. I had to iron the wrinkles out even after washing, but not a big deal. The color of the light blue is true to color. Fits great, but the sleeves are a little long on me. Read more
items.author: Debbie T.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dirty Blue, Beau Blue, Blackish Green, Dark Khaki, Sepia Rose, Orchid Mist, Black, Camel, Dusk Blue, Pale Khaki, Medium Grey, Parchment, White, Gossamer Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
